entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11 except minus 16 in low lying areas.

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the morning then 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023
